ABOUT

Big Brand Concept, the project required us to create our brand's strategy in the future. Choosing "a future police force" and inspiring some idea from sci-fi movies such as Star-wars, Blade Runner where police officer are robots and human resist to earn their freedom. Thus, I create 2 brands and call it "Obey" vs "New World Order" to tell a story about their chaos.
Concept : Sci-fi / Futuristic / Cyberpunk

FUTURE POLICE FORCE (OBEY)

Human are the weakness, they create chaos and cannot control problem in the world. We are OBEY and we execute order to bring renaissance to this world. This is the only solution that humankind will be ordered and united.

RESISTANCE (NEW WORLD ORDER)

New World Order was born to against the idea of using machine to transform this world. We don't believe in robot and refuse any law contrary to the rights of freedom. Join us to start a revolution of human being.

THUAN PHUNG
